titlestmt.titleproper: Charles E. Clapp inventory of Colonial coins, possibly 1923
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Charles E. Clapp inventory of Colonial coins
did.abstract: Inventory of Charles E. Clapp's colonial coins.
did.physloc: Rare Book Room - Pamphlet - Folio - A-HA

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Handwritten list of American Colonial Coins in the collection of Charles E. Clapp. Notations in pencil indicate value and rarity.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Charles E. Clapp, a collector of American Colonial coins, purchased the bulk of James W. Ellsworth’s copper cent collection in 1923. He sold his collections to his brother George Hubbard Clapp in 1924.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Charles E. Clapp inventory of American Colonial Coins, possibly 1923, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
